name: Introduction to Computer Infrastructure
description: Covers basic concepts of computer hardware, software, and networking.

name: Introduction to Programming
description: An introduction to problem-solving and programming fundamentals.

name: Functional Programming
description: Explores declarative programming using functions and immutability.

name: Professional and Personal Development
description: Focuses on teamwork, communication, and professional growth.

name: Problems and Solutions
description: Develops analytical skills through structured problem solving.

name: Fundamentals of Web Development
description: Covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern web technologies.

name: Information Security
description: Introduces principles of cybersecurity and data protection.

name: Programming Using an Object-Oriented Language
description: Teaches object-oriented programming concepts such as classes and inheritance.

name: Algorithm Design and Data Structures
description: Covers common algorithms and efficient data structures.

name: C and C++
description: Introduces low-level programming with C and C++.

name: Modelling Persistent Data
description: Focuses on data modeling and persistence techniques using databases.

name: Software Engineering
description: Covers software development lifecycles, methodologies, and project management.

name: Robotics and Embedded Systems
description: Introduces robotics concepts and embedded system programming.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Covers search algorithms, knowledge representation, and intelligent systems.

name: Mobile Development with Android
description: Covers Android application design, development, and deployment.

name: System and Network Services Administration
description: Focuses on managing operating systems and network services.

name: E-Commerce: Implementation, Management and Security
description: Covers online commerce, security practices, and business management.

name: Professional Issues in the Computing Industry
description: Explores ethical, legal, and professional issues in computing.

name: Major Project
description: A capstone project demonstrating skills in research, design, and implementation.
